Html:
I'm developing a small application that I expect to put into production in the next 6 months. I started to use the datagrid in System.Windows.Controls but now I see there is a datagrid in the Windows Toolkit. 

Should I consider using the toolkit version, does it fix any bugs or add new features? How about if I start using this version, is it likely that I will have problems when they role out a new version of the datagrid in .Net next ?

Thanks,

Toolkit is older than .NET 4. I think you should better using DataGrid inside .NET framework. This toolkit may contains more bugs than .NET 4.

Tony
